    #include<bits/stdc++.h>
    using namespace std;
    #define ll long long
    bool HasUniquePrime(ll A, ll B) {
      if (B == 1) return false;
     
      ll d = __gcd(A, B);
      if (d == 1) return true;
      return HasUniquePrime(A, B/d);
    }
    int main()
    {
      ll t;
      cin>>t;
      while(t--)
      {
        ll a,b;
        cin>>a>>b;
        if(HasUniquePrime(a,b))
        cout<<"No"<<"\n";
        else
        cout<<"Yes"<<"\n";
      }
      return 0;
     }
